title: TRU Glass Top 4 in 1 Contact Grill - CGG-24
transcripts:
Great Panini sandwiches, a tasty breakfast of pancakes and eggs, steaks, burgers, fish, chicken. The cooking possibilities are almost limitless with the TRU 4 in 1 glass top grill. As with other TRU products, no detail was overlooked. The elegant glass finish adds style to the kitchen. The floating hinge adjusts to the thickness of your food. Ideal for thick steaks or gourmet sandwiches. Slightly lift the hand when it opens flat for a larger cooking surface, perfect for use as a griddle. The TRU glass top grill comes with two sets of removable cooking plats. Flat plates for use as a griddle, and ribbed grill plates when using as a Panini press or contact grill. When finished, wipe any excess drippings into the two drip cups, and then slide the nonstick plates into the dishwasher.

The interface is easy to use. Simply select whether you are using as a griddle or a Panini grill, then choose one of the five temperature settings. A Panini press, a grill, a griddle. Breakfast, lunch, dinner and even dessert. Whatever you can imagine, you can create using the innovative 4 in 1 glass top grill, another great kitchen appliance from the TRU -
